price: O People of the Book, why do you mix the truth with falsehood and conceal the truth knowingly?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَلۡبِسُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
